casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Adam Chavez MENDOZA. No. 327P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of June 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
